decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed use of the garage as a training room ancillary to the children's day nursery would result in loss of parking spaces available to staff and visitors to the day nursery. Insufficient parking space would be provided and the resultant conditions in Ashfield Road would be likely to prejudice the free flow of traffic and general safety of road users, and cause nuisance and disturbance to local residents. The proposal is therefore contrary to policies C.4.2, T.2.5, T.3.6 and ENV.1.1 of the Unitary Development Plan and policies C.4.2, T.1.4, T.4.4 and ENV-B.1.1 of the Proposed Alterations to the Revised Deposit of the UDP.
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning consent  00050/L/P7 for use of garage to be used as staff and parent training room in connection with day nursery.
